title: Parallel Agenda
description: In the conclusion to the Zartoto series, a bigger threat than anyone has ever faced in known history threatens the residents of Zartoto, and every planet that has life. It is up to the community members to put a stop to it; otherwise, life, as they know it everywhere, will be wiped out. Where does Alyssa's sword and the elder members of the community tie in? What is Laney's connection to the fairies? Will they be able to save everyone before it's too late?
author: Callie Woodridge
